description: For three nights Hungary's theatre and film university has been blockaded in a student protest.
title: Hungary students challenge Orban 'takeover' with red tape
title_page: Hungary students challenge Orban 'takeover' with red tape - BBC News
maintext: "We just want to show that we want to study, in this building, democratically. And we just want to show what we are capable of. We don't want to scare anyone, even the prime minister."
